TopicTitle: Can someone tell the very first story of KSP?

Articles.Content:
When and why the KSP project was bring on, why it's SQUAD, who decided it, etc.

I'm curious about why it was started.

There was an article about it in a website, in which I forgot the website's name. It talked about Felipe (HarvesteR) and his friend's adventures using firework parts to make rockets when they were children.

There was an article about it in a website, in which I forgot the website's name. It talked about Felipe (HarvesteR) and his friend's adventures using firework parts to make rockets when they were children.

That's a little... TOO first...

That's a little... TOO first...

Well, the article talked about the begginning of KSP, though, I forgot most... All, of it.. :l

Well, the article talked about the begginning of KSP, though, I forgot most... All, of it.. :l

Where? I would like to see it...

At one time, there was also a post on the main site's News section concerning the earliest builds of KSP. It was quite an interesting read and had some interesting pre-release screenshots. Unfortunately, it seems to be gone now...
Oh, found one article that's talking about the beggining of KSP! http://www.somnambulant-gamer.com/2013/08/our-pale-bule-dot-talking-ksp-with-squad.html
Czech/Slovak show named "Gamepage" did a "indie window" about 2.5 years back. where they were talking about KSP. I was the second from our two nations to play.

PAR (Penny Arcade Report) did a writeup on KSP's origins last week:

http://penny-arcade.com/report/article/try-this-at-home-how-a-kid-making-improvised-rockets-created-nasas-favorite

Oh, found one article that's talking about the beggining of KSP! http://www.somnambulant-gamer.com/2013/08/our-pale-bule-dot-talking-ksp-with-squad.html

From that article:

SG: What has been your experience with the Unity Engine? Are there any tips you would give to other developers looking to use Unity?

Bob: Our developers feel like they made a great choice using Unity and said any limitations are the same youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢d find with other engines...

*blandface*
